author: _shemnon
content: CALLF to a code section not defined in the code, exceptional halt?  (b0ffff / CALLF 0xFFFF).  I'm not seeing it in the EIP, but perhaps I'm not looking in the right place

author: lightclient
content: it's part of the validation that `CALLF` operand must be less than `num_code_sections`

author: _shemnon
content: Ah, missed it, point 3 in validation.  Was working on impl first then validation.
